title: English Idioms in Use Advanced Book with Answers (2nd Ed)(gnv64)
description: English Idioms in Use Advanced Book with Answers: Vocabulary Reference and Practice (2nd Ed) by Felicity O'Dell and Michael McCarthy Cambridge University Press | August 2017 | ISBN-10: 1316629732 | PDF | 182 Pages | 73.8 mb Improve your understanding of idioms in English. Explanations and practice of English idioms, written for advanced-level (C1 to C2) learners of English. Perfect for both self-study and classroom activities. Learn idioms in context, with lots of different topics, including 'Learning', 'Formal writing' and 'Telling stories'. Be confident about what you are learning, thanks to Cambridge research into how English is really spoken and written, and get better at studying by yourself, with study tips, follow-up tasks and an easy to use answer key. https://s9.postimg.org/esdvkf5fj/English_Idioms_in_Use_-_Advanced_Book_with_Answers.jpg
